name: The Right Hero for the Job (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect: Once per Duel, during your Main Phase, you can shuffle 1 "Elemental HERO" monster you control into your Deck, then Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Elemental HERO" monster from your Main Deck with a different name than the shuffled card.
